title: GET_HELI_TAIL_ROTOR_DAMAGE_SCALE
content:
0x22239130// GetHeliTailRotorDamageScale
float GET_HELI_TAIL_ROTOR_DAMAGE_SCALE(Vehicle heli);Parameters:heli: The helicopter to checkReturns: Returns a value representing the damage scaling factor applied to the helicopter's tail rotor. The value ranges from 0.0 (no damage scaling) to1.0 (full damage scaling).
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_HELI_TAIL_ROTOR_DAMAGE_SCALE
GetHeliTailRotorDamageScale(vehicle)
